title: Rename project from vcut to grepcut
description:
What: Rename the project from 'vcut' to 'grepcut' across all references.

Why: The project name should be updated to reflect its new identity as grepcut.

Acceptance Criteria:
- [ ] Update repository name reference in README.md
- [ ] Update any package/project names in pyproject.toml
- [ ] Update any other file references to vcut
- [ ] Update GitHub repository name if applicable
